info.description: This is a hotel room booking server with transaction management and concurrency control.
info.title: Hotel Booking API

get.description: Find rooms available for booking in a specific date range and guest count
Check if a specific room is available for a date range

post.description: Create a new booking with payment in a single atomic transaction. First to pay gets the room.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific booking by ID

put.description: Update an existing booking with transaction and concurrency control

delete.description: Cancel an existing booking and free up the room

get.description: Demonstrates how pessimistic locking prevents double booking
Demonstrates the dirty read problem in database transactions
Demonstrates how pessimistic locking prevents lost updates
Demonstrates the lost update problem in concurrent transactions
Demonstrates the phantom read problem in database transactions
Demonstrates serialization anomaly in database transactions
Retrieve all room facilities
Retrieve a specific facility

post.description: Create a payment receipt for a booking with transaction control

get.description: Retrieve a receipt associated with a specific booking
Retrieve a receipt by its ID

put.description: Update an existing receipt with transaction control

delete.description: Delete an existing receipt with transaction control

get.description: Retrieve all room types with their facilities
Retrieve a specific room type with its facilities
get.summary: Get a room type by ID

get.description: Retrieve all hotel rooms with their types
Retrieve all rooms of a specific room type
Retrieve a specific room by its room number
Retrieve the availability calendar for a specific room
Retrieve a specific room with all its facilities
get.summary: Get a room with its facilities
